channel.title: jasmonate response on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in jasmonate response on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaATL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaATL1 Gene Name: AT-hook-Like gene 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The chili pepper CaATL1: an AT-hook motif-containing transcription factor implicated in defence responses against pathogens.

item.title: CaPIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPIF1 Gene Name: Pathogen-Induced Factor 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A plant EPF-type zinc-finger protein, CaPIF1, involved in defence against pathogens.

item.title: CrWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Catharanthus roseus Functional Descriptions: Promoter analysis reveals cis-regulatory motifs associated with the expression of the WRKY transcription factor CrWRKY1 in Catharanthus roseus.

item.title: CsMPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMPK6 Gene Name: Genome: Citrus sinensis cv.

item.title: GhERF-IIb3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF-IIb3 Gene Name: cultivar Reba B50 ethylene-responsive transcription factor-IIb3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhERF-IIb3 regulates the accumulation of jasmonate and leads to enhanced cotton resistance to blight diseas.

item.title: GhJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0810 Gene Symbol: GhJAZ2 Gene Name: jasmonate2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhJAZ2 attenuates cotton resistance to biotic stresses via the inhibition of the transcriptional activity of GhbHLH171.

item.title: MdMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000029168 Gene Symbol: MdMYC2 Gene Name: Jasmonate-Activated Transcription Factor 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdMYC2 is a homology of Arabidopsis MYC2 in apple, it has highly similarity in structure and function to the Arabidopsis MYC2.

item.title: PvTIFY10C
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Phvul.002G002000.1 Gene Symbol: PvTIFY10C Gene Name: TIFY transcription factor Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Common bean (Phaseolus vulgarisL.

item.title: SlVQ15

item.title: SlWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g095770.3 Gene Symbol: SlWRKY70 Gene Name: WRKY DNA-binding transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlWRKY70 is required for Mi-1-mediated resistance to aphids and nematodes in tomato.
